Text:
Thank you for all of the uploads. I have many of the movies in Dvdrip but everytime I look for great movies in bluray, my search stops at you. I request you to re-seed "The Magnificent Seven", I am stuck at 24% for past 27 hrs.
I also request you to re-seed two of you previous uploads: "The Last Emperor" and "Tora!Tora!Tora!". These great movie shouldn't die. Please seed these dying torrents.
Thanks in advance.
